example_sentence_english: I'm looking for an inexpensive hotel.

example_sentence_italian: Ho prenotato un albergo vicino al centro.
example_sentence_english: I booked a hotel near the center.

example_sentence_italian: Gli alberghi in quella zona sono nuovi.
example_sentence_english: The hotels in that area are new.

example_sentence_italian: Ho visitato degli alberghi durante il viaggio.
example_sentence_english: I visited some hotels during the trip.

example_sentence_italian: La reception dell'albergo è aperta 24 ore.
example_sentence_english: The hotel's reception is open 24 hours.

example_sentence_italian: Vado all'albergo per ritirare le chiavi.
example_sentence_english: I'm going to the hotel to pick up the keys.

example_sentence_italian: Consegnerò i documenti agli alberghi selezionati.
example_sentence_english: I will deliver the documents to the selected hotels.
I returned from the hotel late.

example_sentence_italian: Ho ricevuto recensioni dagli alberghi della zona.
example_sentence_english: I received reviews from the hotels in the area.
There's an exhibition in the hotel.

example_sentence_italian: Negli alberghi della costa c'è sempre turismo.
example_sentence_english: In the hotels on the coast there's always tourism.
They installed solar panels on the hotel.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono lavori sugli alberghi vicini.
example_sentence_english: There are works on the nearby hotels.

example_sentence_italian: Ho un accordo con l'albergo per il trasporto.
example_sentence_english: I have an agreement with the hotel for transportation.

example_sentence_italian: L'agenzia collabora con gli alberghi locali.
example_sentence_english: The agency collaborates with the local hotels.

example_sentence_italian: rare/uncommon before vowel; standard: con l'albergo
example_sentence_english: Hanno firmato un accordo col albergo vicino.
column15: They signed an agreement with the nearby hotel.

example_sentence_italian: rare/incorrect for this noun; standard: con gli alberghi
example_sentence_english: Non è comune lavorare coi alberghi di lusso.
column15: It's not common to work with luxury hotels.
